channel.title: Help with error
channel.description:
when i start up it does this
and i delated what i added to npc handler what do i do?
and when me or somebody else try to get on it wont load they keep gettin disconnected
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1103) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:22) at server.main(server.java:26) Starting pureScape Server on 0.0.0.0-->43594
plz help [br][size=1]Posted at: November 15, 2006, 06:02:22 PM[/size][hr]help

item.title: Help with error
item.dc:creator: @Newbi Newbi
item.description:
@Newbi wrote:

[quote=“xxkillerxx, post:1, topic:25742”]when i start up it does this

and i delated what i added to npc handler what do i do?

and when me or somebody else try to get on it wont load they keep gettin disconnected

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1
at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:1103)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:22)
at server.main(server.java:26)
Starting pureScape Server on 0.0.0.0–>43594

plz help
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 15, 2006, 06:02:22 PM[/size][hr]help[/quote]

Try seeing if where you deleted the stuff in NPChandler if you left an extra line of spaces. Also, remember that every “{” must have a “}”.

-Newbi

Read full topic
